channel.title: Python on Joon Career
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Joon Career

item.title: The Paradox of Agent difficulty
item.description: Introduction The realm of Valorant offers players numerous agents, each boasting unique abilities and strategies to win. But how do players, both new and experienced, navigate this vast selection? With a combination of Python programming and a rich dataset extracted from MongoDB, I obtained the performance metrics of various agents across different skill tiers. The result challenges widely held beliefs and shed light on the actual efficacy of agents in various gameplay scenarios.
